meanings: (경찰관) (police) officer, (informal) cop, (남성) policeman, (여성) police woman, (집합적) (the) police, police force, (Am) police department
the chief of the National Police Agency / commissioner
conscripted policeman, policeman drafted by the government
the chief of a police station

vlive.english: Come out policeman! - Not me. - Come out!!
